imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Futuristic glowing AI avatar icon with circuit-board patterns and neon green/cyan color scheme on a dark background (ai-avatar.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a chat UI with a message thread display, a text input field, and a send button. Messages from the user should appear on the right side and AI responses on the left side. Show a typing indicator while awaiting a response. Allow users to clear the conversation.

Apply a sleek, futuristic dark-mode visual theme with deep charcoal/near-black backgrounds, neon green or cyan accent colors for AI elements, clean monospaced or sans-serif typography, subtle glowing effects on active components, and a consistent sci-fi aesthetic throughout the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a conversational AI chat interface where users can type messages and receive simulated AI responses. The backend should store conversation history (messages with roles 'user' and 'assistant', timestamps) in stable storage and expose methods to send a message and retrieve conversation history.
